author: Seren Morris
title: Georgia Governor Kemp's New Rules Explained as Gyms, Bowling Alleys and Nail Salons to Open on April 24
description: While Georgia's stay-at-home order will remain in place until April 30, some businesses will reopen this week.
content:
Georgia's Governor Brian Kemp has announced that he is lifting some lockdown restrictions before the stay-at-home order ends on April 30. The stay-at-home order went into effect on April 3 in Georgia to slow the spread of the novel coronavirus.
